entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023
